title: Barbecued Pancetta Wrapped Prawns
ingredients: ['1 bunch coriander, rinsed', '250ml rapeseed oil', '1 teaspoon honey', '4 teaspoons fresh lime juice', 'salt to taste', '1 (210g) tin chipotle chillies in adobo sauce, chillies set aside', '1 tablespoon adobo sauce from tinned chipotle chillies', '4 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '125ml rice vinegar', '1 clove garlic', '250ml rapeseed oil', 'salt to taste', '1.35kg raw, extra-large prawns, peeled and deveined, tail left on', '900g thinly sliced pancetta']
